Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As promised, we're emailing to let you know that the first blog in our Cloud-Native Operations in 6 Parts: Super Suit Not Required series has launched.
In our first installment, The Cloud-Native Ops Opportunity <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-cloud-native-ops-opportunity?utm_source=blog-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cn-ops-super-suit-part6_q117]]>, author John Allwright <[[https://content.pivotal.io/authors/john-allwright]]>, describes how cloud-native operations is a core enabler to your digital transformation strategy - slashing time to market from months to hours, up-shifting operations teamsâ€™ impact, and extending technological reach beyond the datacenter to multi-cloud operations for maximum flexibility.
View the Blog <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-cloud-native-ops-opportunity?utm_source=blog-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cn-ops-super-suit-part6_q117 ]]>
This is only the beginning of our cloud-native operations journey; stay tuned for upcoming blogs in the series:
- Automated Ops; Freedom to Innovate
- Seeding and Feeding Cloud-Native Operations
- Cloud-Native Operations - Architecture and Monitoring
- Cloud-Native Operations and the Developer Dance
- Real World Cloud-Native Operations - Customer Stories
Enjoy, The Pivotal Team
